headline: Waste Management (WM): Exploring Valuation After Analyst Upgrades and the Stericycle Acquisition
summary: In a wave of analyst upgrades and new coverage this week, Waste Management (WM) is drawing market attention as major banks cite its strong fundamentals, strategic expansion, and the recent Stericycle acquisition. The company’s diversification appears to be a driving force behind its resilience. See our latest analysis for Waste Management. Despite a recent earnings miss and cautious revenue guidance, Waste Management's share price has shown relative stability, climbing 8.4% year-to-date and...
